markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Zevgavizeb (The Beast of Gluttondark
)](/Deities.aspx?ID=82)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 67, [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 67</row>

The Beast of Gluttondark’s sphere of influence encompasses caverns, reptiles, the strong, and all-consuming hunger. A primordial qlippoth-turned-demon lord, Zevgavizeb seems to care little for his followers, and so he is more often propitiated than worshipped.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** expand your clutch’s domain, dominate your enemies, demonstrate mastery over your crafts and environment, devour the weak

**Anathema** surrender in combat, express weakness in the face of adversity, show mercy to the weak

**Area of Concern**
caverns, reptiles, and troglodytes

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

**Favored Weapon** [Spiked Gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=11)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Wyrmkin](/Domains.aspx?ID=57)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Magic Fang](/Spells.aspx?ID=179)

- **4th**
[Dinosaur Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=72)

- **8th**
[Earthquake](/Spells.aspx?ID=95)

</column>
name:
Zevgavizeb (The Beast of Gluttondark
)
